# AccessibilitySettings.Feature.personalVoiceAllowAppsToRequestToUse

**Case**

A constant for opening the Settings app to the setting for Personal Voice > Allow Apps to Request to Use.

## Declaration

```swift
case personalVoiceAllowAppsToRequestToUse
```

## Discussion

You use this constant with [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AccessibilitySettings/openSettings(for:)]. This constant is relevant for the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesizer/PersonalVoiceAuthorizationStatus-swift.enum] API.
title: AccessibilitySettings.Feature.personalVoiceAllowAppsToRequestToUse
